question: I found at 27 weeks that I have gd.  My morning results are always out of range but through out the day it's in range. My new dr put me on a pill at night to help control my morning numbers. I'm so nervous about this. He told me gd can cause still birth, big babies, and diabetes later in life. I'm so scared I can't lose another baby and I want a unmedicated vag delivery.  Pray for me and my lil girl.  Has any one else ever goneed thru this. Stories please
title: gest.diabetes
